mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo (file_name, description, image_url, user_id) VALUES (#{fileName}, #{description}, #{imageUrl}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT photo_id as photoId, file_name as fileName, description, image_url as imageUrl, user_id as userId, created_at as createdAt FROM photo WHERE photo_id = #{photoId}
